snippet: Professional baseball is thriving in South Korea, with the festivities in the stands both raucous and organized to a degree that American fans might find startling.
abstract: Professional baseball is thriving in South Korea, where it remains most popular spectator sport; festivities in the stands are both raucous and organized to a degree that American fans might find startling.
lead_paragraph: Professional baseball is thriving in South Korea, with the festivities in the stands both raucous and organized to a degree that American fans might find startling.

headline.main: In Korean Baseball, Louder Cheers and More Squid
headline.print_headline: In Korean Baseball, Louder Cheers and More Squid
